Prerequisite(s): One Leaden Hyena Maneuver
Range: Melee or Ranged
Target: One creature
Duration: See text

Description

Striking a low blow against your opponent, you take them off their feet and dispose of their fighting ability temporarily. Make an attack roll against a creature. On a successful hit, the target is knocked prone and must make a Fortitude save (DC 14 + your initiation modifier). On a successful save they are staggered for 1 round. On a failure, all of the creature's movement speeds are reduced to 0 for a number of rounds equal to your initiation modifier. becomes staggered for a number of rounds equal to your initiation modifier.
